title: Watch PL goals on your mobile
text:
Watch Premier League goals on your mobile with Sky Sports Re-launched Football Score Centre app your home of highlights By Gerard Brand Last Updated: 14/12/16 2:06pm Download the new Sky Sports Football Score Centre app to get highlights of Premier League and Football League matches on your phone on match days This season, Sky Sports customers can watch the goals and highlights from all 380 Premier League matches for the 2016/17 season on their mobile phones. 
It's Pep v Jose, it's Conte's Chelsea rebirth, it's Leicester's title defence, it's story after story where the incredible could happen (again). 
Here's how you can watch it all unfold… 
So, I am a Sky TV customer with Sky Sports bundle... 
Good decision, thank you. You have full access to all our Premier League video content which is exclusively available to our loyal Sky Sports subscribers across mobile and online. Laura and Smithy run through how you can watch Premier League clips on your mobile devices via the Football Score Centre app 
So, how do I watch the goals during matches? 
Simply download our Football Score Centre (if you don't have it already!) from the App Store , if you have an iPhone, or the Google Play Store, if you use an Android device. 
Our re-launched Football Score Centre app will show: Highlights of all Saturday's 12.45pm and 3pm Premier League games from 5.15pm Highlights of all other games regardless of kick-off time 15 minutes after the full-time whistle In-game clips and half-time highlights from all non-Saturday 3pm games in our brilliant live match service Android users can download from Google Play 
Anywhere else I can watch? 
They're in our Sky Sports for Smartphone app, too. All in-game clips and half-time highlights from all non-Saturday 3pm games will be published in our live match blogs. 
It's just during the Saturday afternoon blackout period when you can't watch the action as it happens. You'll just have to get along to a game instead! 
What about the Sky Sports website? 
Visit skysports.com from midnight on any match day for: All match highlights Round-ups, including best goals and a weekly best saves, showboats, players and funnies package. Archive footage available from the Premier League vault Sky Sports will show 126 live Premier League games this season - more than ever before 
Anything else I need to know? 
Well, there's no substitute for watching the action live on Sky Sports' award-winning football broadcasts - Monday Night Football and Super Sunday. And this season we're adding Friday night matches and Saturday lunchtime kick-offs as part of our biggest ever season of Premier League football with 126 live top-flight games. 
You'll also find full-time match highlights available on match days on Sky Go and the Sky Q app. 
Oh, and Premier League match footage is limited to our users in the UK and Ireland only. 
If you already have a Sky Sports subscription, you may need to link your package to your Sky iD ( click here for more information ). 
Unfortunately, this in-game content on mobile is not currently available to Virgin Media or BT customers. But you can still watch the clips on Sky Sports digital products after 10pm on match days.… 
Really? That all sounds brilliant, but I don't have a Sky Sports subscription. How can I watch? Fast and easy online upgrade 
If you don't have a Sky Sports subscription, click here to get one now . You know it makes sense. 
If that's a step too far for you at this stage, you can still watch Premier League action on your mobile from 10pm every match day.
